name: Measure area of rectangles by counting unit squares

skills.name: Find the area of rectilinear shapes by counting squares

explanations.A: I think you have counted the lines to make the shape. To find the area you need to count the number of unit squares...
explanations.B: I think you have counted the vertical lines. To find the area you need to count the number of unit squares...
explanations.C: The shape is made from 4 squares, each square has an area of 1 square unit therefore the area of the shape is 4 square units
explanations.D: This is the perimeter of the shape. To find the area you need to count the number of unit squares...
